text: For me, this crisis highlights the importance of ensuring we build our global health security capacity like we do other aspects of our national security: our pandemic response, capacity & investments need to be at least largely free of political cycles & influence.

In 2016, US underwent Joint External Evaluation (JEE) of our capacity to handle global health security threats. Here is our report card. It foretells some of the areas where we failed during this pandemic & now highlight new sectors we need to invest in.  https://t.co/2rF7PHRAsc
Sure would have been nice if our country had gotten this economic support and pandemic response funds months and months ago. https://t.co/25eKkX7WGY
